alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 12:58PM CST until January 12 at 1:45PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Monroe County in south central Alabama... Northern Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... Southwestern Wilcox County in south central Alabama... * Until 145 PM CST. * At 1257 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southeast of Coffeeville, or 14 miles west of Grove Hill, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Grove Hill, Whatley, Beatrice, Coffeeville, Vredenburgh and Fulton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CST for south central and southwestern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
